markup.description: The Image Reorderer lets users reorder images within a collection. It provides fully keyboard-accessible and mouse-based manipulation of images on-screen. It is intended to work well with screen magnifiers, low screen resolutions, and linear layouts.
markup.instructions:
• Try reordering the images using the mouse.
  • Try reordering the images using only the keyboard: Direction keys (arrow keys or i-j-k-m) move focus; CTRL + direction keys move the item.
